abstract: The Brewers' Zack Greinke might not be too smooth when it comes to celebrating, but when it comes to fielding, he can teach his teammates a few things.
snippet: The Brewers' Zack Greinke might not be too smooth when it comes to celebrating, but when it comes to fielding, he can teach his teammates a few things.
lead_paragraph: Zack Greinke has had to deal with his fair share of criticism in his career, from his battles with anxiety to his controversial (to some) Cy Young award. But Ryan Braun may have taken things too far when discussing his team's pitching star earlier this week.

headline.main: Greinke Brings Arm, Glove to N.L.C.S.
